headline: TEMESCAL FILAMENT EVAPORATOR
keywords: thermal evaporators filament evaporators clamshell evaporators
categories.lvl2: Vacuum Processing Equipment  >  Deposition Equipment > Resistance Evaporators
specstable:
Manufacturer Airco Temescal
Model BJD-1800
Description Filament Evaporator--Cryo Pumped
Vacuum System Cryo Pumped
Vacuum System

CTI Cryotorr 8
CTI compressor, Water cooled
Helium lines and CTI regeneration controller
Base pressure in the clean chamber will be in 10-8 Torr range after extended pump down time.

Film Thickness Monitor Yes
Other Information

Source Chamber
18" Dia x 18" High, water cooled, 304 stainless steel
Source Tray

  • 18" Dia flat plate with 10 1" dia. feedthrough ports
  • 1 EMI EMS 7.5V 600A DC Power Supply
  • Two filament boats - Sequential operation.
  • Granville Philips 307 Gauge Controller with process control

NB: Substrate domes not included.

Power Requirements 208 V 70.0 A 60 Hz 3 Phase
Exterior Dimensions
Width 56.000 in (142.2 cm)
Depth 34.000 in (86.4 cm)
Height 89.000 in (226.1 cm)
Weight 1,322 lb (600 kg)
